segments.source_content:
---
description: Static assets are the non-code files that are directly copied to the build output. Learn about how they are handled and what the best practices of using static assets are.
---
# Static Assets
Static assets are the non-code files that are directly copied to the build output. They include images, stylesheets, favicons, fonts, etc.

translations.zh-hant: 靜態資源是指直接複製到建置輸出中的非程式碼文件，包括圖片、樣式表、網站圖示、字型等。

segments.source_content: By default, you are suggested to put these assets in the `static` folder. Every file you put into **that directory will be copied** into the root of the generated `build` folder with the directory hierarchy preserved. E.g. if you add a file named `sun.jpg` to the static folder, it will be copied to `build/sun.jpg`.

translations.zh-hant: 預設情況下，建議將這些資源放在 `static` 資料夾中。**該目錄下的所有文件**都會被複製到生成的 `build` 資料夾的根目錄中，並保留目錄層級結構。例如，如果在靜態資料夾中添加名為 `sun.jpg` 的文件，它將被複製到 `build/sun.jpg`。

segments.source_content: This means that:

- for site `baseUrl: '/'`, the image `/static/img/docusaurus.png` will be served at `/img/docusaurus.png`.
- for site `baseUrl: '/subpath/'`, the image `/static/img/docusaurus.png` will be served at `/subpath/img/docusaurus.png`.

translations.zh-hant:
- 對於網站 `baseUrl: '/'`，圖片 `/static/img/docusaurus.png` 將在 `/img/docusaurus.png` 路徑下提供。
- 對於網站 `baseUrl: '/subpath/'`，圖片 `/static/img/docusaurus.png` 將在 `/subpath/img/docusaurus.png` 路徑下提供。

segments.source_content: You can customize the static directory sources in `docusaurus.config.js`. For example, we can add `public` as another possible path:

translations.zh-hant: 您可以在 `docusaurus.config.js` 中自訂靜態目錄來源。例如，我們可以添加 `public` 作為另一個可能的路徑：

segments.source_content: Now, all files in `public` as well as `static` will be copied to the build output.

translations.zh-hant: 現在，`public` 和 `static` 中的所有文件都將被複製到建置輸出中。

segments.source_content: ## Referencing your static asset {#referencing-your-static-asset}
### In JSX {#in-jsx}

In JSX, you can reference assets from the `static` folder in your code using absolute URLs, but this is not ideal because changing the site `baseUrl` will **break those links**. For the image `` served at `https://example.com/test`, the browser will try to resolve it from the URL root, i.e. as `https://example.com/img/docusaurus.png`, which will fail because it's actually served at `https://example.com/test/img/docusaurus.png`.

translations.zh-hant: 在 JSX 中，您可以使用絕對 URL 從 `static` 資料夾引用資源，但這並不理想，因為更改網站 `baseUrl` 會**破壞這些連結**。對於在 `https://example.com/test` 路徑下提供的圖片 ``，瀏覽器會嘗試從 URL 根目錄解析它，即 `https://example.com/img/docusaurus.png`，這將失敗，因為它實際上是在 `https://example.com/test/img/docusaurus.png` 路徑下提供。

segments.source_content: You can `import()` or `require()` the static asset (recommended), or use the `useBaseUrl` utility function: both prepend the `baseUrl` to paths for you.

translations.zh-hant: 您可以 `import()` 或 `require()` 靜態資源（推薦），或使用 `useBaseUrl` 工具函數：兩者都會為您將 `baseUrl` 添加到路徑前。

segments.source_content: Examples:
```jsx title="MyComponent.js" ```
You can also import SVG files: they will be transformed into React components.

translations.zh-hant: 您也可以導入 SVG 文件：它們將被轉換為 React 組件。

segments.source_content: ### In Markdown {#in-markdown}

In Markdown, you can stick to using absolute paths when writing links or images **in Markdown syntax** because Docusaurus handles them as `require` calls instead of URLs when parsing the Markdown. See [Markdown static assets](./guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-assets.mdx).

translations.zh-hant: 在 Markdown 中，您可以在** Markdown 語法**中撰寫連結或圖片時使用絕對路徑，因為 Docusaurus 在解析 Markdown 時會將它們視為 `require` 調用而非 URL。請參閱 [Markdown 靜態資源](./guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-assets.mdx)。

segments.source_content: ```md You write a link like this: [Download this document](/files/note.docx) Docusaurus changes that to: Download this document ```
:::warning[use Markdown syntax] Docusaurus will only parse links that are in Markdown syntax. If your asset references are using the JSX tag `` / ``, nothing will be done. :::

translations.zh-hant: :::warning[使用 Markdown 語法] Docusaurus 僅會解析 Markdown 語法中的連結。如果您的資源引用使用的是 JSX 標籤 `` / ``，則不會進行任何處理。 :::

segments.source_content: ### In CSS {#in-css}
In CSS, the `url()` function is commonly used to reference assets like fonts and images. To reference a static asset, use absolute paths:

translations.zh-hant: 在 CSS 中，`url()` 函數通常用於引用字型和圖片等資源。要引用靜態資源，請使用絕對路徑：

segments.source_content: The `static/font/Caroline.otf` asset will be loaded by the bundler.

:::warning[important takeaway]

One important takeaway: **never hardcode your base URL!** The base URL is considered an implementation detail and should be easily changeable. All paths, even when they look like URL slugs, are actually file paths.

If you find the URL slug mental model more understandable, here's a rule of thumb:

- Pretend you have a base URL like `/test/` when writing JSX so you don't use an absolute URL path like `src="/img/thumbnail.png"` but instead `require` the asset.
- Pretend it's `/` when writing Markdown or CSS so you always use absolute paths without the base URL.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning[重要提示]

一個重要的提示：**永遠不要硬編碼您的基礎 URL！** 基礎 URL 被視為實現細節，應該易於更改。所有路徑，即使它們看起來像 URL 段，實際上是文件路徑。

如果您覺得 URL 段心理模型更容易理解，這裡有一個經驗法則：

- 在撰寫 JSX 時，假設您有一個像 `/test/` 這樣的基礎 URL，這樣您就不會使用像 `src="/img/thumbnail.png"` 這樣的絕對 URL 路徑，而是 `require` 該資源。
- 在撰寫 Markdown 或 CSS 時，假設它是 `/`，這樣您總是使用不帶基礎 URL 的絕對路徑。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Caveats {#caveats}
Keep in mind that:

- By default, none of the files in the `static` folder will be post-processed, hashed, or minified.
  - However, as we've demonstrated above, we are usually able to convert them to `require` calls for you so they do get processed. This is good for aggressive caching and better user experience.
- Missing files referenced via hard-coded absolute paths will not be detected at compilation time and will result in a 404 error.
- By default, GitHub Pages runs published files through [Jekyll](https://jekyllrb.com/). Since Jekyll will discard any files that begin with `_`, it is recommended that you disable Jekyll by adding an empty file named `.nojekyll` file to your `static` directory if you are using GitHub pages for hosting.

translations.zh-hant:
- 預設情況下，`static` 資料夾中的文件都不會經過後處理、雜湊或最小化。
  - 但如上所述，我們通常能將其轉換為 `require` 調用以便進行處理。這有利於實現積極緩存和更好的用戶體驗。
- 若透過硬編碼的絕對路徑引用缺失文件，編譯時不會被檢測到，將導致 404 錯誤。
- GitHub Pages 預設會使用 [Jekyll](https://jekyllrb.com/) 處理發布的文件。由於 Jekyll 會忽略以 `_` 開頭的文件，若使用 GitHub Pages 託管，建議在 `static` 目錄中添加名為 `.nojekyll` 的空文件來停用 Jekyll。
